name: Pictures of My Lovely Cat
description:
A meditation on love and parasites.

made at global game jam 2018 -- theme "transmission" -- with HTML5/js with Phaser and Paint of Persia.

michael v - writing, programming, photos

andy z - handcrafted pixelation

Galaxy photos from ESA/Hubble, CC 4.0

Audio: "Spaceship Atmosphere 05" by Tristan_Lohengrin
